lexUnit.name: maul.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: wound by scratching and tearing.

sentence.text: The lion mauls the warrior , who is desperately trying to fend him off with his knees and shield .
` It hauled me to the ground with a thump and started mauling me on the back and neck . "
It was a wonder they had not all mauled each other to death long ago and left the damp , chilly coastline unpeopled except for howling birds .
He was mauled after his leg slipped into the tiger 's cage on a casino stage in Reno , Nevada .
The case of the mentally ill young man who climbed into an enclosure at London Zoo on 31 December and was mauled by a lion is the most recent example .
Public outcry followed the revelation that Ben Silcock , who was mauled after climbing into the lions ' compound at London Zoo , was severely mentally ill and was not getting adequate treatment .
If , as Kierkegaard once claimed , if the whole world can be divided into those who write and those who do not write , then we are two different species mauling each other without comprehension .

In one scene this lioness turned nasty and mauled me .

I wheeled around to see a 3D abhorrent Zombie attempting to maul me .
` I ca n't believe I actually stood here and let you -- maul me . "
For example , there was the Australian edition of the racy Sunday Sport which claimed that Kylie had been mauled by a killer shark while skin diving on the Great Barrier Reef .

Maybe he 'd been mauled .
` One side of the face was badly mauled .
The face and right hand had been badly mauled . "
Mr George Daszczuk was pinned to the ground and mauled for 15 minutes as he was set upon by the two dogs , which had chewed their way through the wooden door of a garage they were guarding .

SHe 'd always been able to disassociate ` work " from pleasure , clients from lovers , but had been worried that the experience of Jahsaxa 's friends mauling hir might have intruded into this objectivity .
You let a farm boy maul you about ? !
A farmer said that some of his lambs had been horribly mauled at Weathercotes in the spring of 1988 ; there were huge bite marks on the lambs and paw prints nearby .
A SHARK mauled and killed a 28-year-old surfer on Australia 's Gold Coast yesterday .
